snippet: The militant, Abdel Rehman al-Hussainan, died in a missile attack on a house in North Waziristan, along the border with Afghanistan.
abstract: Al Qaeda senior commander Abdel Rehman al-Hussainan is killed in American drone strike in North Waziristan, Pakistan, a restive tribal area along the border with Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The militant, Abdel Rehman al-Hussainan, died in a missile attack on a house in North Waziristan, along the border with Afghanistan.

headline.main: U.S. Drone Strike Kills a Commander for Al Qaeda in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: U.S. Drone Strike Kills a Commander for Al Qaeda in Pakistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
